{{cpp/utility/any/title|swap}}
{{cpp/utility/any/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++17|
void swap( any&amp; other ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Swaps the content of two {{tt|any}} objects.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|other|object to swap with}}
{{par end}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;any&gt;
#include &lt;print&gt;
#include &lt;string&gt;
#include &lt;string_view&gt;

int main()
{
    std::any a = std::string{"King"};
    std::any b = std::string_view{"Queen"};
    std::println("a = {}", std::any_cast&lt;std::string&amp;&gt;(a));
    std::println("b = {}", std::any_cast&lt;std::string_view&amp;&gt;(b));
    std::println("swap(a, b)");
    a.swap(b);
    std::println("a = {}", std::any_cast&lt;std::string_view&amp;&gt;(a));
    std::println("b = {}", std::any_cast&lt;std::string&amp;&gt;(b));
}
|output=
a = King
b = Queen
swap(a, b)
a = Queen
b = King
}}
